title: Penthouse level structural upgrade
description: Owner requested reinforced penthouse level to support helipad and green roof system. Additional steel and concrete required.

title: Lobby marble and water feature
description: Architect redesigned main lobby with Italian Carrara marble floors and 20-ft water feature wall. Replaces original stone tile spec.

title: Unforeseen contaminated soil
description: Environmental testing during landscape excavation revealed petroleum contamination requiring removal and remediation of 2400 tons.

title: HVAC chiller upsizing
description: Mechanical engineer determined chillers undersized for server room heat loads after major tech tenant committed to floors 8-10.

title: Value engineering - roofing
description: Replace specified built-up roof with single-ply TPO membrane. Equivalent 20-year warranty with faster installation.

title: Infinity pool expansion
description: Owner added second infinity pool on level 5 amenity deck. Structural reinforcement and additional mechanical required.

title: Presidential suite upgrade
description: Upgrade top 3 floors to presidential suite configuration with private elevator and butler pantry. Full redesign of floors 40-42.

title: Kitchen exhaust redesign
description: Health department review required larger exhaust hoods and makeup air for 6 restaurant kitchens. Mechanical redesign required.

title: Underground parking waterproofing
description: Water intrusion at parking level 3 discovered during concrete curing. Additional waterproofing membrane and drainage mat required.

title: Value engineering - light fixtures
description: Substitute specified custom Italian fixtures with equivalent domestic manufacturer. Same design intent at 40% cost reduction.

title: Crane rail realignment
description: Surveyor discovered 4-inch deviation in crane rail alignment over 800 LF section. Requires removal and reinstallation of rail and clips.

title: Soil stabilization
description: Geotechnical borings missed soft clay lens at 30-ft depth under container yard. Requires lime stabilization of 8-acre area.

title: Additional shore power
description: IMO 2025 regulations require shore power connections at all berths. Original design had 2 of 4 berths. Adding 2 additional connections.

title: Tower A penthouse customization
description: Three penthouse buyers requesting custom floor plans with merged units and upgraded finishes. Structural and MEP modifications required.

title: Foundation dewatering extension
description: Water table higher than predicted requiring extended dewatering operations through structure completion instead of just foundation phase.

title: Utility relocation - gas main
description: Encountered unmarked 16-inch gas main during excavation. Requires coordination with CenterPoint for relocation before road widening can proceed.

title: Sound wall upgrade
description: Adjacent neighborhood petition resulted in TxDOT requiring 16-ft sound walls instead of original 12-ft specification.

title: Performing arts venue acoustics
description: Acoustic consultant recommended upgraded sound isolation and variable acoustics system. Original spec would not meet performance standards.

title: Retail tenant HVAC modifications
description: Three anchor tenants require dedicated HVAC systems instead of shared central plant. Additional rooftop units and ductwork.

title: Helipad structural upgrade
description: Hospital board added trauma center designation requiring rooftop helipad. Structural reinforcement from foundation through roof required.

title: MRI suite shielding
description: Radiology department expanded from 2 to 4 MRI suites. Additional RF shielding and structural isolation required.

title: Vapor recovery upgrade
description: EPA issued new emission standards requiring enhanced vapor recovery on all 12 tanks instead of original 8. Additional equipment and controls.

title: Fire suppression expansion
description: Insurance underwriter required foam suppression on secondary containment areas in addition to tank nozzles.

title: Marine bulkhead extension
description: Soil borings during construction revealed soft sediments requiring 40-ft bulkhead piles instead of 25-ft design. Full redesign of marine foundation.

title: Luxury finish upgrade
description: Pre-sale buyers voted for upgraded finishes including Miele appliances marble baths and smart home package in all 200 units.

title: Wetland mitigation
description: Environmental survey discovered previously unmapped wetland requiring 3:1 mitigation. Additional land purchase and restoration work.

title: Asbestos abatement
description: Demolition revealed extensive asbestos in original 1965 building systems. Full abatement required before renovation can proceed.
